body: Provide a *cheat* command that would allow to look inside AI's hand. It could be initiated as a separate, "devel" or training duel type. It would be very useful for highlighting AI's dumb behavior, for instance. Speaking of revealing in general, I would like to examine AI's hand when the game is decided, and a top cards of each library.

content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on August 26, 2012 23:40:31_

Provide a *cheat* command that would allow to look inside AI's hand. It could be initiated as a separate, "devel" or training duel type. It would be very useful for highlighting AI's dumb behavior, for instance. Speaking of revealing in general, I would like to examine AI's hand when the game is decided, and a top cards of each library.
